reviewText: Bought as a replacement for the same one I'd had for a long time.  Instructions are clear and the video is pleasant overall.
Product came on time and was exactly as described.
By far my favorite yoga dvd! The music is relaxing, as is her voice. Really enjoy her as an instructor (albeit not physical instructor that is present, but she is still amazing)!
The video was a great yoga stretch!  The great Caribbean scenery and soothing and calming music transports you to the beach!
I love this workout, it has different levels and challenges along with the beautiful back drop of the Caribbean. Wonderful
